name: Run Minerva Run 2: Run Harder
description:
After being cryogenically frozen for over ten years, Minerva Mink awakens in a pond. Only wanting to simply go home, she must escape, or succumb to the multiple throngs of slimy hornballs wanting to ejaculate inside her every orifice! Help her run home, so that she can watch Oprah, eat donuts and gossip with her friends about stupid bullshit!

This game is for adults only!

If you like what you see here please help the development of this game!

ULTIMATE ROR PATREON

RUN MINERVA RUN 2 MAILING LIST

or visit 

TOON PIMP'S PALACE

for more fun!
